metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title includes Sr. and posting specifies 8‑10 years of experience

job_family.evidence: Title and responsibilities focus on data engineering tasks

sub_specialty.evidence: Experience with Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark points to batch ETL pipelines

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management or team‑lead responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud provider referenced in the posting or extraction data

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark are batch‑processing technologies

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tool (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) listed

storage_layer.evidence: Hadoop ecosystem implies data lake storage (HDFS) rather than a dedicated warehouse

remote_restriction.evidence: Posting says "locals only for onsite" and restricts to GA (state level)

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirement is stated in the posting

relocation_required.evidence: Locals only requirement indicates no relocation needed

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting

citizenship_required.evidence: Must be a resident of the US (GA) but no citizenship clause is provided

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract type are not specified

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are listed in the extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Job description does not discuss career progression or growth paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching language appears in the posting

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion or advancement opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or mobility

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described

requirement_strictness.evidence: Only must‑have hard skills are listed; no nice‑to‑have items

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused solely on senior data engineering responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8‑10 years of experience aligns with senior‑level expectations for the listed skill set
